trinnovProducts.name: Altitude32
trinnovProducts.headline: Flagship Reference Immersive Processor
trinnovProducts.description: Software-based reference processor designed for large, no-compromise home cinemas and studio-grade listening rooms, with very high channel counts and full object-based decoding.
trinnovProducts.story: Altitude32 is the original Altitude platform processor that set the reference for immersive home cinema. Built around a powerful, software-defined architecture, it supports very high channel counts for expansive Dolby Atmos, DTS:X Pro, and Auro-3D layouts while running the same Trinnov Optimizer core used in top studios and premium cinemas. Because major functions live in software and a modular hardware design, the platform can be updated over time – including HDMI board upgrades and new rendering features – so a properly installed Altitude32 can evolve with future formats rather than being replaced.
features: Trinnov Optimizer with 3D microphone-based loudspeaker and room correction
Object-based immersive decoding for Dolby Atmos, DTS-X Pro, and Auro-3D
High-resolution audio processing up to 24-bit / 96 kHz with 64-bit floating-point engine
Flexible bass management and support for complex multichannel speaker layouts
applications: Reference home cinemas and screening rooms
Luxury media rooms with complex multichannel layouts
Private studios requiring precise room correction
specs: Flagship Altitude platform processor for large home cinemas and reference rooms
Supports very high immersive channel counts with extensive speaker layout flexibility
Software-based platform with field-upgradable features, including modular HDMI video board
Designed for long-term projects where future format support and updates are critical

lifestyle.alt: Altitude32 front panel close-up with status display
lifestyle.caption: Altitude32 front panel, showing the minimalist industrial design and status display used in Trinnov cinema and studio installs.

lifestyle.alt: Altitude32 installed in a home cinema equipment rack
lifestyle.caption: Altitude32 mounted in a dedicated equipment rack, feeding a large immersive home theater with complex loudspeaker layout.

lifestyle.alt: Altitude platform rear connectivity with balanced XLR and digital I/O
lifestyle.caption: Rear I/O of the Altitude platform, featuring balanced XLR outputs and digital connectivity for high-channel-count systems.

trinnovProducts.name: Altitude16
trinnovProducts.headline: 20-Channel Reference Immersive Processor
trinnovProducts.description: Brings Altitude-level processing and Trinnov Optimizer to premium residential theaters that need up to 20 discrete channels, in a more compact chassis.
trinnovProducts.story: Altitude16 delivers the same processing engine and sound quality as the Altitude32, but in a form factor and I/O configuration tailored to systems that will not exceed 20 channels. It renders up to 20 discrete channels of immersive audio with Dolby Atmos, DTS:X Pro, and Auro-3D, and natively processes high-resolution 24-bit / 96 kHz audio. The unit offers 16 balanced XLR outputs plus additional S/PDIF outputs, supports advanced bass management and active crossovers, and integrates the full Trinnov Optimizer calibration workflow. With HDMI 2.1 connectivity, eARC support, and a software-based platform that benefits from ongoing updates, Altitude16 is designed as a long-term reference for serious home cinemas that don’t require the extreme channel counts of Altitude32.
features: Trinnov Optimizer with 3D microphone-based loudspeaker and room correction
Object-based immersive decoding for Dolby Atmos, DTS-X Pro, and Auro-3D
High-resolution audio processing up to 24-bit / 96 kHz with 64-bit floating-point engine
Flexible bass management and support for complex multichannel speaker layouts
applications: Premium home cinemas and private theaters
High-end media rooms with immersive audio layouts
specs: Immersive AV processor for home cinemas up to 20 discrete rendering channels
Analog outputs - 16 × balanced XLR, with additional +4 channels available by combining analog and S/PDIF outputs
Digital I/O - 4 × S/PDIF inputs (2 optical, 2 coaxial) and 2 × S/PDIF outputs (1 optical, 1 coaxial)
HDMI 2.1 video board with 8 inputs, 2 outputs, HDR10 / HDR10+ / HLG / Dolby Vision, 4K120 / 8K60 and eARC on HDMI Output 1
64-bit floating-point processing with native sample rates up to 96 kHz and Intel multi-core CPU platform

lifestyle.caption: Rear panel of the Altitude16, showing 16 balanced XLR outputs, S/PDIF I/O, and dual-output HDMI 2.1 connectivity for modern sources.
